availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Morgan County, Kentucky, tailor. North Carolina native. Married to Nancy S. Hager Sundys. Father of Alice Sundys, Permelia E. Sundys, Amanda Sundys, Millford Sundys, John Sundys, Anna Sundys, and Samuel Sundys. Tailor in Morgan County in 1850. Tailor in Morgan County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, District 1, p. 108. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, Hillsboro, p. 8 Find A Grave, "Kendrick Allen Sundys (1816-1897)," Memorial #139362439, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/139362439# (accessed August 13, 2018).
